mapper.select: SELECT hstr.job_post_no, jp.title, hstr.pass_yn, re.resume_no, re.job_history, re.user_id, us.user_name, us.user_gender, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, us.user_birth, CURDATE())-(RIGHT(CURDATE(), 5) < RIGHT(us.user_birth, 5)) AS user_age FROM (SELECT job_post_no, resume_no, aplc_hstr_date, pass_yn FROM tbl_aplc_hstr WHERE job_post_no IN (SELECT job_post_no FROM tbl_job_post WHERE company_id = 'company03')) AS hstr LEFT JOIN tbl_job_post jp ON hstr.job_post_no = jp.job_post_no -- 기업정보 LEFT JOIN tbl_resume re ON hstr.resume_no = re.resume_no -- 이력서 정보 LEFT JOIN tbl_user us ON re.user_id = us.user_id -- 유저 정보 WHERE jp.company_id = 'company03' ORDER BY hstr.aplc_hstr_date DESC LIMIT 3;
